EmailTemplate.name: The Irish girl who chatted the receptionist (1493130746.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: The Irish girl who chatted the receptionist (1493130746.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Meir, Sorry for taking up the time of your receptionist! She is lovely (and not just because she is Irish!)She mentioned to reach out in a month so I will absolutely do that. Is there a time or day that works best for you so I don’t call out of the blue? Looking forward to connecting and glad to have a chance to chat again! Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
